name: com.ndygen.wiab
description: Wasp in a Box - Virtual occupancy sensor for Homey

scripts.homey:build: cp .homeycompose/app.json app.json && npx homey app build
scripts.homey:install: npm run build && npx homey app install
scripts.audit:check:
echo '
Security Audit Status:
' && echo 'Known vulnerabilities are documented in SECURITY.md' && echo 'These are accepted risks from Homey SDK dependencies
' && npm audit || echo '
Note: Low/moderate vulnerabilities are suppressed (see SECURITY.md)
Run npm run audit:full to see all vulnerabilities
'
